#summary Using the genotype list service with KIR nomenclature.

= Usage =

To load loci and alleles from the KIR nomenclature database version 2.4.0, either

{{{
$ curl -X post http://localhost:8080/gl/load-kir-alleles
}}}

or visit

http://localhost:8080/gl

in a web browser and hit the Load KIR alleles button


<br/>
Continue with KIR examples.
